remarks: Value of the multiplication operation of an opposite ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
statement:
opprval.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
opprval.2 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
opprval.3 $e |- O = ( oppR ` R ) $.
opprmulfval.4 $e |- .xb = ( .r ` O ) $.
opprmulfval $p |- .xb = tpos .x. $.
